content: **this sock pattern was designed for the sock knitters anonymous group for the november 2024 mystery sock mock ** the pattern is divided into four clues to be released on november 1 8 15 and 22 of 2024 because it is designed as a mystery no photos of the socks are present in any of the clues you will need fingering-weight sock yarn 400-420 m / 100 g color 1 50-90 g color 2 10-15 g needles 2 25 mm or size needed to obtain correct gauge tapestry needle and 2 stitch markers optional the pattern is written for magic loop but you can use dpns or 2 circular needles as well gauge 32 sts and 44 rds = 10 cm in stockinette many thanks for test knitting and proofreading to momofnation /people/momofnation knittingall /people/knittingall ainotv /people/ainotv sandysays /people/sandysays misscellaneous /people/misscellaneous and gerstperson /people/gerstperson
